title: How to Draw Well in Draw Something 2

steps.headline: Pick some words that you think you can draw.
steps.description: Things like rainbow, yolk and many others. If you can draw hard things or if you want to challenge yourself, go ahead.

steps.headline: Look at pictures.
steps.description: This will serve as your guide.

steps.headline: Sketch the drawing using the lightest gray pencil color.
steps.description: If you don't have one, buy one. It is just cheap.

steps.headline: Outline the sketch with black.
steps.description: Your drawing will stand out with black.

steps.headline: Color your drawing.
steps.description: In coloring, highlighter or watercolor is the best. Pencil can be. Don't worry if the color passed over the outline. Fix it with eraser.

steps.headline: Try to add shading effects.
steps.description: With a darker shade, add it at the side of the drawing. Make it thin for a realistic look.

steps.headline: Outline it again.
steps.description: The color or eraser may erased it so you have to outline it again.

text: Pick some words that you think you can draw. Things like rainbow, yolk and many others. If you can draw hard things or if you want to challenge yourself, go ahead. Look at pictures. This will serve as your guide. Sketch the drawing using the lightest gray pencil color. If you don't have one, buy one. It is just cheap. Outline the sketch with black. Your drawing will stand out with black. Buy some colors. The more the merrier. Color your drawing. In coloring, highlighter or watercolor is the best. Pencil can be. Don't worry if the color passed over the outline. Fix it with eraser. Try to add shading effects. With a darker shade, add it at the side of the drawing. Make it thin for a realistic look. Outline it again. The color or eraser may erased it so you have to outline it again.
